arguments.response_text: I would say that my favorite cultural tradition, Swedish, is when I eat a boy for breakfast. Yes. I would say kalbada is very nice. Good for you, yes. I agree with you, of course. It's a very nice tradition. My mom and dad eats it every day. It's healthy and all. You can buy a boy at the Swedish shop here in Chicago. Thank you from us, we come from Helsingborg. Peace.
arguments.response_summary: The text discusses Swedish culture, specifically mentioning a traditional dish called 'boy' and its popularity in the speaker's family. It also mentions buying the dish at a Swedish shop in Chicago.
arguments.matched_prompt: What are your favorite cultural traditions?
